alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 10:38AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pasco, Hernando, northwestern Pinellas and northern Hillsborough Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1037 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hudson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Dade City, Hudson, Lutz, Holiday, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, Palm Harbor, Hillsborough River State Park, New Port Richey East, South Brooksville, Zephyrhills South, North Brooksville and Zephyrhills West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
